text: z@ko<MEH>r y@hwAh<PAS> mE<SIL>h=hA<MUN>yAh lA<ZQP>nw* hbyT (hab*i<TIP>yTAh) w*r@'e<MER>h 'Et=xEr@p*Ate<SIL>nw*:
na<SIL>x<HPA>lAte<AZL>nw*<PAS> nE<SIL>hEp@kA<MUN>h l@zAri<ZQP>ym b*At*e<TIP>ynw* l@nAk@ri<SIL>ym:
y@twomi<MEH>ym hAyi<AZL>ynw*<PAS> 'yn (w@'e<MUN>yn) 'A<ZQP>b 'im*ote<TIP>ynw* k*@'al@mAn<SIL>wot:
meyme<AZL>ynw*<PAS> b*@kE<MUN>sEp W/.Ati<ZQP>ynw* `eYe<TIP>ynw* b*im@xi<MER>yr yAbo<SIL>'w*:
`a<MEH>l Yaw*A're<AZL>nw*<PAS> nir@d*A<ZQP>p@nw* yAga<TIP>`@nw* l' (w@lo<MER>') h<SIL>w*na<SIL>x=lA<SIL>nw*:
miY@ra<AZL>yim<PAS> nAta<MUN>n*w* yA<ZQP>d 'aW/*.<TIP>w*r liW/ׂ@b*o<MER>`a<SIL> lA<SIL>xEm:
'<HPA>bote<MEH>ynw* xA<SIL>T@'w*<PAS> 'ynm (w@'eynA<ZQP>m) 'nxnw (wa<SIL>'<HPA>na<TIP>x@nw*) `<HPA>w͏ono<SIL>teyhE<MER>m sAbA<SIL>l@nw*:
`<HPA>bAdiym<PAS> mA<MUN>W/.@lw* bA<ZQP>nw* p*ore<TIP>q 'e<MER>yn miy*AdA<SIL>m:
b*@nap@W/.e<AZL>nw*<PAS> nAbi<MUN>y' lax@me<ZQP>nw* mip*@ne<TIP>y xE<MER>rEb ham*id@b*A<SIL>r:
`wore<AZL>nw*<PAS> k*@tan*<MUN>w*r nik@mA<ZQP>rw* mip*@ne<TIP>y zal@`<HPA>p<MER>wot rA`A<SIL>b:

W/ׂAriym<PAS> b*@yAdA<MUN>m nit@l<ZQP>w* p*@ne<MER>y z@qeni<TIP>ym lo<MER>' nEh@d*A<SIL>rw*:

W/.Abat<PAS> m@W/ׂ<MUN>woW/ׂ lib*e<ZQP>nw* nEh@p*a<MER>k@ l@'e<TIP>bEl m@xole<SIL>nw*:
nA<SIL>p@lAh<PAS> `<HPA>TE<MUN>rEt ro'W/.e<ZQP>nw* '<SIL>woy=nA<MER>' lA<TIP>nw* k*i<MER>y xATA<SIL>'nw*:
`al=zE<RBM>h hAyA<MEH>h dAwEh<PAS> lib*e<ZQP>nw* `al='e<TIP>l*Eh xA<SIL>W/.@k<MER>w* `eyne<SIL>ynw*:
`a<MEH>l har=Yiy*won<PAS> W/.EW/*.Ame<ZQP>m W/.<SIL>w*`Ali<TIP>ym hil*@kw*=b<SIL>wo:
'at*A<MEH>h y@hwAh<PAS> l@`wolA<MUN>m t*eW/.e<ZQP>b k*is@'<HPA>kA<TIP> l@d<MER>wor wAd<SIL>wor:
lA<MEH>m*Ah lAnE<AZL>Yax<PAS> t*iW/.@k*Axe<ZQP>nw* t*a<SIL>`az@be<TIP>nw* l@'o<MER>rEk@ yAmi<SIL>ym:
h<HPA>W/.iybe<AZL>nw* y@hwA<MEH>h | 'elE<AZL>ykA<PAS> wnW/wb (w@<SIL>nAW/.<ZQP>w*bAh) xad*e<MER>W/. yAme<TIP>ynw* k*@qE<SIL>dEm:
k*i<YET>y 'im=mA'o<MUN>s m@'as@t*A<ZQP>nw* qAYa<MER>p@t*A `Ale<TIP>ynw* `ad=m@'o<SIL>d:
'eykAh<PAS> yw*`a<MUN>m zAhA<ZQP>b yiW/.@nE<TIP>' hak*E<MUN>tEm haT*<ATN>wob t*iW/.@t*ap*e<AZL>k@nAh<PAS> 'ab@ney=qo<ZQP>dEW/. b*@ro<TIP>'W/. k*Al=xw*Y<SIL>wot:
b*@ne<MEH>y Yiy*won<PAS> hay@qAri<ZQP>ym ham@sul*A'i<TIP>ym b*ap*A<ATN>z 'eykA<MEH>h nEx@W/.@bw*<PAS> l@nib@ley=xE<ZQP>rEW/ׂ ma<SIL>`<HPA>W/ׂe<TIP>h y@de<MER>y ywoYe<SIL>r:
g*am=tnyn (t*an*iym<PAS>) xA<MUN>l@Yw* W/.a<ZQP>d heyni<TIP>yqw* g*<SIL>w*reyhE<ATN>n b*at=`am*i<MUN>y l@'ak@zA<ZQP>r ky `nym (k*ay@`eni<TIP>ym) b*am*id@b*A<SIL>r:
d*Aba<AZL>q l@W/.<MER>won ywone<TEB>q 'El=xik*<TIP>wo b*aY*AmA<ATN>' `<SIL>wolAliym<PAS> W/.A<MUN>'<HPA>lw* lE<ZQP>xEm p*ore<TIP>W/ׂ 'e<MER>yn lAhE<SIL>m:
hA'o<SIL>k@liym<PAS> l@ma<MUN>`<HPA>dan*i<ZQP>ym nAW/.a<TIP>m*w* b*a<SIL>xw*Y<ATN>wot hA<SIL>'<HSE>muniym<PAS> `<HPA>le<MUN>y twolA<ZQP>` xib*@q<TIP>w* 'aW/.@p*at*<SIL>wot:
way*ig@d*al<PAS> `<HPA>w<MUN>͏on b*at=`am*i<ZQP>y me<SIL>xaT*a<TIP>'t s@do<ATN>m ha<SIL>h<HPA>pw*kA<MUN>h k@mwo=rA<ZQP>ga` w@lo'=xA<MER>lw* bA<TIP>h* yAdA<SIL>yim:
zak*<MEH>w* n@ziyrE<AZL>yhA<PAS> miW/*.E<ZQP>lEg Yax<TIP>w* me<SIL>xAlA<ATN>b 'A<MEH>d@mw* `E<AZL>YEm<PAS> mip*@niyni<ZQP>ym sap*i<TIP>yr g*iz@rAtA<SIL>m:
xAW/.a<MEH>k@ miW/*.@xwor<PAS> t*A<SIL>'<HQA>rA<ZQP>m lo<MER>' nik*@r<TIP>w* b*a<SIL>xw*Y<ATN>wot YApa<MEH>d `worAm<PAS> `al=`aY@mA<ZQP>m yAbe<TIP>W/. hAyA<MER>h kA`e<SIL>Y:
Twobi<MEH>ym hAyw*<PAS> xal@ley=xE<ZQP>rEb me<SIL>xal@le<TIP>y rA`A<ATN>b W/.E<MUN>he<MEH>m yAzu<AZL>bw*<PAS> m@duq*Ari<ZQP>ym mit*@nw*bo<TIP>t W/ׂAdA<SIL>y:
y@de<RBM>y nAW/.iym<PAS> rax<HPA>mA<MUN>niy*<ZQP>wot b*iW/*.@l<TIP>w* yal@deyhE<ATN>n hAy<MEH>w* l@bArwot<PAS> lA<ZQP>mwo b*@W/.E<TIP>bEr b*at=`am*i<SIL>y:
k*il*A<MEH>h y@hwAh<PAS> 'Et=x<HPA>mAt<ZQP>wo W/.Apa<TIP>k@ x<HPA>r<MUN>won 'ap*<ATN>wo way*aY*Et='e<MUN>W/. b*@Yiy*<ZQP>won wat*o<TIP>'kal y@so<SIL>dotE<SIL>yhA:

lo<MEH>' hE<SIL>'<HSE>mi<AZL>ynw*<PAS> mal@key='E<ZQP>rEY wkl (k*o<TIP>l) yo<SIL>W/.@be<MUN>y tebe<ATN>l k*i<MEH>y yAbo'<PAS> Ya<MUN>r w@'woye<ZQP>b b*@W/.a<SIL>`<HPA>re<TIP>y y@r<SIL>w*W/.AlA<SIL>im:
me<SIL>xaT*o<MUN>'wt n@biy'E<ZQP>yhA `<HPA>w͏ono<TIP>t k*o<SIL>h<HPA>nE<ATN>yhA haW/*.o<SIL>p@ki<MER>ym b*@qir@b*A<TIP>h* d*a<MER>m Yad*iyqi<SIL>ym:
nA`<MEH>w* `iw@riym<PAS> b*a<SIL>xw*Y<ZQP>wot n@go<SIL>'<HPA>l<TIP>w* b*ad*A<ATN>m b*@lo<MUN>' y<SIL>w*k@l<ZQP>w* yig*@`<TIP>w* b*il@bu<SIL>W/.eyhE<SIL>m:

s<MUN>w*rw* TAme<GAR>' qA<MUN>r@'w* lA<RBM>mwo s<MEH>w*rw* s<AZL>w*rw*<PAS> 'al=t*ig*A<ZQP>`w* k*i<MER>y nAY<TIP>w* g*am=nA<ATN>`w* 'A<SIL>m@rw*<PAS> b*ag*woyi<ZQP>m lo<MER>' ywosi<TIP>pw* lAg<SIL>w*r:
p*@ne<MEH>y y@hwAh<PAS> xil*@qA<ZQP>m lo<MER>' ywosi<TIP>yp l@hab*iyTA<ATN>m p*@ne<MEH>y ko<SIL>h<HPA>niym<PAS> lo<MUN>' nAW/ׂA<ZQP>'w* zqnym (w*z@qeni<TIP>ym) lo<MER>' xAnA<SIL>nw*:
`wdynh (`wode<AZL>ynw*<PAS>) t*ik@lE<MUN>ynAh `eyne<ZQP>ynw* 'El=`Ez@rAte<TIP>nw* hA<ATN>bEl b*@Yip*iy*Ate<MUN>nw* Yip*i<ZQP>ynw* 'El=g*<TIP>woy lo<MER>' ywoW/.i<SIL>`a:
YAd<MUN>w* Y@`Ade<ZQP>ynw* mil*E<TIP>kEt b*ir@xo<SIL>bote<ATN>ynw* qAra<MER>b qiY*e<TEB>nw* mA<SIL>l@'<MER>w* yAme<TIP>ynw* k*iy=bA<MER>' qiY*e<SIL>nw*:
qal*i<MEH>ym hAyw*<PAS> ro<SIL>d@pe<ZQP>ynw* min*iW/.@re<TIP>y W/.AmA<ATN>yim `al=hE<SIL>hAri<MUN>ym d*@lAqu<ZQP>nw* b*am*id@b*A<TIP>r 'A<MER>r@bw* lA<SIL>nw*:
r<MEH>w*xa 'ap*e<AZL>ynw*<PAS> m@W/.i<MUN>yxa y@hwA<ZQP>h nil@k*a<TIP>d b*iW/.@xi<SIL>ytwotA<ATN>m '<HPA>W/.E<MUN>r 'Ama<ZQP>r@nw* b*@Yil*<TIP>wo ni<SIL>x@yE<MER>h bag*woyi<SIL>m:
W/ׂi<MEH>yW/ׂiy w@W/ׂim@xiy<PAS> b*at='<HSE>d<ZQP>wom ywW/bty (ywoW/.E<TIP>bEt) b*@'E<MUN>rEY `<ATN>w*Y g*am=`Ala<AZL>yik@<PAS> t*a<SIL>`<HPA>bAr=k*<ZQP>wos t*iW/.@k*@ri<TIP>y w@tit@`Ari<SIL>y:
t*am=`<HPA>w͏onek@<PAS> b*at=Yiy*<ZQP>won lo<MER>' ywosi<TIP>yp l@hag@lwote<ATN>k@ p*Aqa<MEH>d `<HPA>w͏onek@<PAS> b*at='<HSE>d<ZQP>wom g*il*A<TIP>h `al=xaT*o'tA<SIL>yik@:

'eykA<MUN>h | yA<SIL>W/.@bA<MUN>h bAdA<RBM>d hA`iyr<PAS> rab*A<MUN>tiy `A<ZQP>m hA<SIL>y@tA<TIP>h k*@'al@mAnA<ATN>h rab*A<MUN>tiy bag*woyi<RBM>m W/ׂArA<AZL>tiy<PAS> b*am*@diyn<ZQP>wot hA<SIL>y@tA<TIP>h lAma<SIL>s:

b*Ak<AZL>wo tib@k*E<GER>h b*al*a<RBM>y@lAh w@dim@`AtAh*<PAS> `a<MUN>l lE<SIL>x<HSE>yA<ZQP>h* 'e<SIL>yn=lA<MER>h* m@naxe<TIP>m mik*Al='o<SIL>h<HPA>bE<ATN>yhA k*Al=re`E<AZL>yhA<PAS> b*A<MUN>g@dw* bA<ZQP>h* hA<MER>yw* lA<TIP>h* l@'o<SIL>y@bi<SIL>ym:

g*A<SIL>l@tA<AZL>h y@hw*dA<MEH>h me`o<AZL>niy<PAS> w*mero<MUN>b `<HPA>bodA<ZQP>h hi<YET>y' yA<SIL>W/.@bA<MUN>h bag*woyi<ZQP>m lo<MER>' mA<SIL>Y@'A<TIP>h mAn<ATN>woxa k*Al=ro<SIL>d@pE<MER>yhA hiW/*ׂiyg<TIP>w*hA b*e<MER>yn ham*@YAri<SIL>ym:

d*ar@ke<AZL>y Yiy*<GER>won '<HPA>bel<RBM>wot mib*@liy<PAS> b*A'e<MUN>y mwo`e<ZQP>d k*Al=W/.@`ArE<AZL>yhA<PAS> W/.<SIL>womemi<ZQP>yn k*o<SIL>h<HPA>nE<TIP>yhA nE<SIL>'<HSE>nAxi<ATN>ym b*@t<SIL>w*lotE<MER>yhA n*w*g<TIP>wot w@hi<MER>y' mar=lA<SIL>h*:

hAy<AZL>w* YArE<MEH>yhA l@ro'W/.<PAS> 'o<SIL>y@bE<MUN>yhA W/.Al<ZQP>w* k*i<SIL>y=y@hwA<MER>h hwogA<TIP>h* `a<MUN>l rob=p*@W/.A`E<ATN>yhA `<SIL>wolAlE<TEB>yhA hA<SIL>l@k<MER>w* W/.@bi<TIP>y lip@ney=YA<SIL>r:

way*eYe<MER>' mn bt= (mib*at=) Yiy*<TIP>won k*Al=h<HPA>dArA<ATN>h* hAy<MUN>w* W/ׂArE<RBM>yhA k*@'ay*Aliym<PAS> lo<SIL>'=mAY@'<MUN>w* mir@`E<ZQP>h way*e<SIL>l@k<MER>w* b@lo'=ko<TIP>xa lip@ne<MER>y rwode<SIL>p:

zA<SIL>k@rA<MUN>h y@r<SIL>w*W/.Ala<RBM>im y@me<MEH>y `An@yAh*<PAS> w*m@rw*dE<ZQP>yhA k*o<YET>l ma<SIL>x<HPA>mudE<ZQP>yhA '<HPA>W/.E<MER>r hAy<TIP>w* mi<MUN>ymey qE<ATN>dEm b*in@po<DAR>l `am*A<MUN>h* b*@yad=YA<RBM>r w@'e<MEH>yn `wozer<PAS> lA<ZQP>h* rA'<MUN>w*hA YAri<ZQP>ym W/ׂA<SIL>x<HPA>q<TIP>w* `a<MER>l miW/.@b*at*E<SIL>hA:

xe<MEH>T@' xA<SIL>T@'Ah<PAS> y@r<MUN>w*W/.Ala<ZQP>im `al=k*e<TIP>n l@niydA<MUN>h hAyA<ATN>tAh k*A<SIL>l=m@kab*@dE<MEH>yhA hiz*iyl<AZL>w*hA<PAS> k*i<SIL>y=rA'<MUN>w* `Er@wAtA<ZQP>h* g*am=hi<MER>y' nE<SIL>'En@xA<TIP>h wat*A<MER>W/.Ab 'Ax<SIL>wor:

Tum@'AtA<MUN>h* b*@W/.w*lE<RBM>yhA lo<MEH>' zA<SIL>k@rAh<PAS> 'a<SIL>x<HPA>riytA<ZQP>h* wat*e<MUN>rEd p*@lA'i<ZQP>ym 'e<MER>yn m@naxe<TIP>m lA<ATN>h* r@'e<MEH>h y@hwAh<PAS> 'Et=`An@yi<ZQP>y k*i<MER>y hig@d*i<TIP>yl 'woye<SIL>b:

yAdwo<PAS> p*A<MUN>raW/ׂ YA<ZQP>r `a<TIP>l k*Al=ma<SIL>x<HPA>mad*E<ATN>yhA k*i<SIL>y=rA'<HPA>tA<MEH>h gwoyim<PAS> b*A<MUN>'w* miq@d*AW/.A<ZQP>h* '<HPA>W/.E<MUN>r Yiw*i<ZQP>ytAh lo<SIL>'=yAbo<MER>'w* baq*AhA<TIP>l lA<SIL>k@:

k*Al=`am*A<MEH>h* nE<SIL>'<HSE>nAxiym<PAS> m@baq*@W/.i<MUN>ym lE<ZQP>xEm nA<SIL>t@n<DAR>w* mxmwdyhm (ma<SIL>x<HPA>mad*eyhE<TEB>m) b*@'o<TIP>kEl l@hAW/.i<MUN>yb nA<ATN>pEW/. r@'e<MEH>h y@hwAh<PAS> w@<SIL>hab*i<ZQP>yTAh k*i<MER>y hAyi<TIP>ytiy z<SIL>wolelA<SIL>h:

l<MUN>wo' '<HPA>leykEm<ZIN> k*Al=`o<MUN>b@rey dErEk@<AST> hab*i<MUN>yTw* w*r@'<ZQP>w* 'im=ye<MEH>W/. mak@'wob<PAS> k*@mak@'obi<ZQP>y '<HPA>W/.E<MER>r `wola<TIP>l li<ATN>y '<HPA>W/.Er<PAS> hwogA<MUN>h y@hwA<ZQP>h b*@y<TIP>wom x<HPA>r<MER>won 'ap*<SIL>wo:

mim*Ar<TEB>wom W/.A<SIL>lax='e<MER>W/. b*@`aY@mota<TIP>y way*ir@d*E<ATN>n*Ah p*Ara<AZL>W/ׂ rE<MEH>W/.Et l@rag@lay<PAS> h<HSE>W/.iyba<MUN>niy 'Ax<ZQP>wor n@tAna<AZL>niy<PAS> W/.o<SIL>memA<ZQP>h k*Al=hay*<TIP>wom d*AwA<SIL>h:

niW/ׂ@qad<TLP> `o<AZL>l p*@W/.A`a<GER>y b*@yAd<RBM>wo yiW/ׂ@t*A<MER>r@g<TEB>w* `Al<MER>w* `al=Yaw*A'ri<TIP>y hik@W/.i<MUN>yl k*oxi<ATN>y n@tAna<MUN>niy '<HPA>donA<ZQP>y b*iyde<TIP>y lo<SIL>'='w*ka<MER>l q<SIL>w*m:

sil*A<AZL>h kAl='ab*iyra<MEH>y | '<HPA>donAy<PAS> b*@qir@b*i<ZQP>y qArA<MER>' `Ala<TEB>y mwo`e<TIP>d liW/.@b*o<MUN>r b*a<SIL>xw*rA<ATN>y g*a<YET>t d*Ara<MUN>k@ '<HPA>donA<ZQP>y lib@tw*la<TIP>t b*at=y@hw*dA<SIL>h:

`al='e<MUN>l*Eh | '<HPA>ni<MUN>y b<SIL>wokiy*A<RBM>h `eyni<MEH>y | `eyniy<PAS> yo<MUN>r@dAh m*a<ZQP>yim k*i<SIL>y=rAxa<MER>q mim*E<TEB>n*iy m@naxe<TIP>m meW/.i<MUN>yb nap@W/.i<ATN>y hAy<MEH>w* bAnay<PAS> W/.<SIL>womemi<ZQP>ym k*i<MER>y gAba<TIP>r 'woye<SIL>b:

p*e<SIL>r@W/ׂA<AZL>h Yiy*<GER>won b*@yAdE<RBM>yhA 'e<MEH>yn m@naxem<PAS> lA<ZQP>h* Yiw*A<DAR>h y@hwA<TEB>h l@ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<TIP>b s@biybA<MUN>yw YArA<ATN>yw hA<SIL>y@tA<DAR>h y@r<SIL>w*W/.Ala<TEB>im l@nid*A<TIP>h b*e<SIL>yneyhE<SIL>m:

Yad*i<MER>yq h<TEB>w*' y@hwA<TIP>h k*i<MUN>y pi<MUN>yhw* mAri<ATN>ytiy W/.im@`w*=nA<MUN>' kAl=`mym (hA<SIL>`am*i<RBM>ym) w*r@'w*<PAS> mak@'obi<ZQP>y b*@t<SIL>w*lota<MER>y w*ba<SIL>xw*ra<TIP>y hA<SIL>l@k<MER>w* baW/*.E<SIL>biy:

qArA<MEH>'tiy la<SIL>m@'ah<HPA>bay<PAS> he<MUN>m*Ah rim*<ZQP>w*niy k*o<SIL>h<HPA>na<MER>y w*z@qena<TIP>y b*A`i<MUN>yr g*AwA<ATN>`w* k*i<SIL>y=biq@W/.<MER>w* 'o<AZL>kEl<PAS> lA<ZQP>mwo w@yAW/.i<TIP>ybw* 'Et=nap@W/.A<SIL>m:

r@'e<AZL>h y@hwA<MEH>h k*i<SIL>y=Yar=liy<PAS> me`a<MUN>y x<HQA>mar@mA<ZQP>rw* nEh@p*a<MEH>k@ lib*iy<PAS> b*@qir@b*i<ZQP>y k*i<MER>y mAr<TIP>wo mAri<ATN>ytiy mix<MER>w*Y W/.ik*@lAh=xE<TIP>rEb b*ab*a<MER>yit k*am*A<SIL>wEt:
